pkgmetadata.longdescription: mocktest********... is a powerful and easy-to-use mocking library, inspired by rspec andsimilar in some ways to Michael Foord's popular Mock module.Source / Issues:http://github.com/gfxmonk/mocktest/tree/masterZero install feed:http://gfxmonk.net/dist/0install/mocktest.xml(this is the preferred distribution method)Cheese shop entry:http://pypi.python.org/pypi/mocktestDocumentation / Installation----------------------------Please see the full documentation online at:http://gfxmonk.net/dist/doc/mocktest/doc/
